about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
As the full moon sets behind you the sun begins to rise in front of you as the ocean waves are pulled back and forth by both, seen, forces. The magnificent feeling leads you into the next experience where you find yourself in the middle of the ocean and a lake, a summer sky and a storm coming in over the ocean. In the final experience in this immersion wash away the unresolved stresses as the ocean waves wash away the storms in your mind.

Purpose
Relaxation
Self reflection
Mindfulness
Self meditation

Length
10:32

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

name: Exhale XR - In The Waves

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
